amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part C of House Report 116-51 to limit the matching requirement for the Specialty Crop Research Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Schrier.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
